name: blogster-newspaper
title: Blogster Newspaper
desc: A beautiful, performant and accessible theme built with Tailwind.
article:
A beautiful, performant and accessible theme built with Tailwind.

  • Newspaper. A crispy Astro theme built with Tailwind.
  • Fast. Fast by default. Blogster templates are engineered to be performant and load before you could blink, even when not cached.
  • Dark mode. Auto dark mode with a manual toggle. Hit that toggle button at the top of the page and see the mode change.
  • Mobile first. Responsive and loads fast in all devices.
  • Accessible. A well thought out semantic and accessible content.
  • Perfect lighthouse score. 100 across the board.
  • Content authoring for everyone. Author content using markdown (<code>.md</code>) from your code editor or directly in GitHub.
  • Extended markdown with Markdoc. Type-safe custom components like YouTube embed, Twitter embed (or anything you want really) in your markdown (<code>.md</code>) files.
  • Built-in RSS feed for your blog, excellent SEO and more.

github.name: blogster
github.description: A collection of beautiful, accessible and performant Astro blog templates.
